name: Dungeons and Daggers
description:
Raid as many Jewels from the dungeon as possible but beware of Traps, Enemies and Flying Daggers!

FEATURES:

  • NO ADS
  • NO IN-APP PURCHASES
  • 8BIT RETRO GRAPHICS
  • CHIPTUNE MUSIC
  • ACTION GAME
  • DUNGEONS
  • DAGGERS

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Windows 7/8/10/11

512MB Ram

250MB Hard Disk Space

DirectX 9 or Later

DirectX Web Components (Included in package)

This package contains both Win32 and Win64 versions of game.

Language: English

NOTES:

(Multi Language will be supported in the next update)

We also have a Android version on Amazon App Store and Google Play store.

IOS, MacOS and Linux versions coming soon.

CREDITS:

Contains music composed and copyrighted by Retro Indie Josh. You can view his page here  https://retroindiejosh.itch.io/
